title: renderthis setup
text: can install current version renderthis GitHub: output formats require additional packages, format provide instructions install missing dependencies. can also choose install renderthis dependencies:
code: # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("jhelvy/renderthis") # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("jhelvy/renderthis", dependencies = TRUE)

title: renderthis setup
text: Rendering PDF requires local installation Chrome. don’t Chrome installed, can use browsers based Chromium, Chromium , Edge, Vivaldi, Brave, Opera. case, need set path browser want use pagedown package well chromote package use complex_slides = TRUE partial_slides = TRUE arguments. installing packages, can set paths like : unable install Chrome (e.g. computing cluster), recommended workflow render intermediate output formats use alternative method rendering PDF. example, render pptx Rmd file without Chrome, : Render html to_html(= "slides.Rmd") Use vscode remote vscode-preview-server extension open html local machine (preferrably Chrome installed) Save pdf Chrome Render pptx to_pptx(= "slides.pdf")
code: Sys.setenv(PAGEDOWN_CHROME = "/path/to/browser") Sys.setenv(CHROMOTE_CHROME = "/path/to/browser")

title: renderthis
text: Render html file Rmd file xaringan slides:
code: to_html(from = "slides.Rmd")

title: renderthis
text: Input can Rmd file, html file, url: Note: Rendering PDF requires local installation Google Chrome
code: to_pdf(from = "slides.Rmd") to_pdf(from = "slides.html") to_pdf(from = "https://jhelvy.github.io/renderthis/example/slides.html")

title: renderthis
text: Input can Rmd file, html file, pdf file, url: Example:
code: to_gif(from = "slides.Rmd") to_gif(from = "slides.html") to_gif(from = "slides.pdf") to_gif(from = "https://jhelvy.github.io/renderthis/example/slides.html")

title: renderthis
text: Input can Rmd file, html file, pdf file, url:
code: to_mp4(from = "slides.Rmd") to_mp4(from = "slides.html") to_mp4(from = "slides.pdf") to_mp4(from = "https://jhelvy.github.io/renderthis/example/slides.html")

title: renderthis
text: Creates pptx file slide contains png image slide. won’t able edit content png(s) Powerpoint, can least annotate . (See slidex package @datalorax opposite: pptx –> xaringan!) Input can Rmd file, html file, pdf file, url:
code: to_pptx(from = "slides.Rmd") to_pptx(from = "slides.html") to_pptx(from = "slides.pdf") to_pptx(from = "https://jhelvy.github.io/renderthis/example/slides.html")

title: renderthis
text: Render png image(s) slides. Use slides argument determine slides include (defaults 1, returning just first slide). Input can Rmd file, html file, pdf file, url: Example:
code: # By default, a png of only the first slide is built to_png(from = "slides.Rmd", to = "title_slide.png") to_png(from = "slides.html", to = "title_slide.png") to_png(from = "slides.pdf", to = "title_slide.png") to_png(from =    "https://jhelvy.github.io/renderthis/example/slides.html",   to = "title_slide.png" )  # Use the `slides` argument to control which slides get rendered into pngs to_png(from = "slides.pdf", to = "first_slide.png", slides = "first") to_png(from = "slides.pdf", to = "last_slide.png", slides = "last") to_png(from = "slides.pdf", slides = c(1, 3, 5)) # Choose subsets of slides to_png(from = "slides.pdf", slides = -1) # Negative indices remove slides to_png(from = "slides.pdf", slides = "all")

title: renderthis
text: Render png first slide Rmd file. Image sized sharing social media (e.g. Twitter). Note: option requires chromote pdftools packages. Example:
code: to_social(from = "slides.Rmd")

title: renderthis
text: “Complex” slides slides contain panelsets html widgets / advanced features might render well pdf. render slide, set complex_slides = TRUE. want render new slide increment incremental slides, set partial_slides = TRUE. options available options functions depend rendering pdf: to_pdf() to_png() to_gif() to_mp4() to_pptx() Note: options require chromote pdftools packages.

title: Render media to different formats
text: package contains functions rendering xaringan slides different formats, including html, pdf, png, gif, pptx, mp4, well ‘social’ output, png first slide re-sized sharing social media. Looking xaringanBuilder? package formerly known xaringanBuilder now renderthis. need install xaringanBuilder previous package name, see instructions .

title: Render media to different formats
text: can install current version renderthis GitHub: output formats require additional packages, format provide instructions install missing dependencies. can also choose install renderthis dependencies: Note: get renderthis, recommend installing package dependencies making sure local installation Google Chrome. many users need output formats, several outputs require additional packages suggested dependencies aren’t installed default unless requested described . table lists packages required output type:
code: # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("jhelvy/renderthis") # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("jhelvy/renderthis", dependencies = TRUE)

title: Render media to different formats
text: Use renderthis render slides different formats. diagram render hierarchy: use renderthis, first load package: package functions follow common pattern: functions start to_*() render slides desired format (e.g., to_pdf()). functions required argument set full local path input file. functions optional argument. provided, can full local path output file, must end appropriate extension (e.g. slides.gif to_gif()). provided, output file name determined based argument. Learn renderthis Get Started article.
code: Rmd  |  |--> social (png)  |  |--> html        |        |--> pdf              |              |--> png                    |                    |--> gif                    |                    |--> mp4                    |                    |--> pptx library(renderthis)

title: Render media to different formats

code: remotes::install_github("jhelvy/renderthis@v0.0.9")

what: Build xaringan slides to multiple outputs. — build_all
title: Build xaringan slides to multiple outputs. — build_all
text: Build xaringan slides multiple outputs. Options "html", "social" "pdf", "png", "gif", "mp4", "pptx". See individual build_*() function details output type.

title: Build xaringan slides to multiple outputs. — build_all
code: build_all(   input,   include = c("html", "social", "pdf", "png", "gif", "mp4", "pptx"),   exclude = NULL,   complex_slides = FALSE,   partial_slides = FALSE,   delay = 1,   density = 100,   slides = "all",   fps = 1 )

title: Build xaringan slides to multiple outputs. — build_all
text: input Path Rmd file xaringan slides. include vector different output types build. Options "html", "social", "pdf", "png", "gif", "mp4", "pptx". Defaults c("html", "social", "pdf", "png", "gif", "mp4", "pptx"). exclude vector different output types build. Options "html", "social", "pdf", "png", "gif", "mp4", "pptx". Defaults NULL, case output types built. complex_slides "complex" slides (e.g. slides panelsets html widgets advanced features), set complex_slides = TRUE. Defaults FALSE. use chromote package iterate slides pace set delay argument. Requires local installation Chrome. partial_slides partial (continuation) slides included output? FALSE, default, complete slide included PDF. delay Seconds delay advancing printing new slide. used complex_slides = TRUE partial_slides = TRUE. density Resolution resulting pngs slide file. Defaults 100. slides numeric integer vector slide number(s) render png files , one "", "first", "last". Negative integers select slides include. one slide included, pngs returned zip file. Defaults "", case slides included. fps Frames per second resulting mp4 file.

title: Build xaringan slides to multiple outputs. — build_all
text: Builds slides multiple output formats.

title: Build xaringan slides to multiple outputs. — build_all
code: if (interactive()) {     # Build every output by default     with_example("slides.Rmd", {         build_all("slides.Rmd")     })      # Both of these build html, pdf, and gif outputs     # (PDF outputs require Google Chrome for {pagedown})     with_example("slides.Rmd", {         build_all("slides.Rmd", include = c("html", "pdf", "gif"))         build_all("slides.Rmd", exclude = c("social", "png", "mp4", "pptx"))     }) }

title: Deprecated Build Functions — deprecated-build
text: renderthis, name xaringanBuilder, previously provided functionality using build_ functions. consistent new package name, function names also changed. build_html() now to_html() build_pdf() now to_pdf() build_png() now to_png() build_gif() now to_gif() build_mp4() now to_mp4() build_pptx() now to_pptx() build_social() now to_social() Argument names. Note input output_file arguments functions also renamed. now named .

title: Deprecated Build Functions — deprecated-build
code: build_html(...)  build_pdf(...)  build_png(...)  build_gif(...)  build_mp4(...)  build_pptx(...)  build_social(...)

title: Deprecated Build Functions — deprecated-build
text: ... Parameters passed new to_*() function

title: Deprecated Build Functions — deprecated-build
text: See corresponding new function appropriate return value.

what: Render slides as a gif file. — to_gif
title: Render slides as a gif file. — to_gif
text: Render slides gif video file. function renders pdf, converts slide pdf png, converts deck png files gif file.

title: Render slides as a gif file. — to_gif
code: to_gif(   from,   to = NULL,   density = 100,   slides = "all",   fps = 1,   complex_slides = FALSE,   partial_slides = FALSE,   delay = 1,   keep_intermediates = FALSE )

title: Render slides as a gif file. — to_gif
text: Path Rmd file, html file, pdf file, url. url slides website, must provide full url ending ".html". Name output gif file. density Resolution resulting pngs slide file. Defaults 100. slides numeric integer vector slide number(s) include gif, one "", "first", "last". Negative integers select slides include. Defaults "", case slides included. fps Frames per second resulting gif file. complex_slides "complex" slides (e.g. slides panelsets html widgets advanced features), set complex_slides = TRUE. Defaults FALSE. use chromote package iterate slides pace set delay argument. Requires local installation Chrome. partial_slides partial (continuation) slides included output? FALSE, default, complete slide included PDF. delay Seconds delay advancing printing new slide. used complex_slides = TRUE partial_slides = TRUE. keep_intermediates keep intermediate files used render final output? default FALSE.

title: Render slides as a gif file. — to_gif
text: Slides rendered gif file.

title: Render slides as a gif file. — to_gif
code: with_example("slides.Rmd", {     # Render gif from Rmd, html, pdf, or direct URL     to_gif("slides.Rmd") }) #> ℹ Rendering slides.Rmd into renderthis_39167b57bad5.html #> ✔ Rendering slides.Rmd into renderthis_39167b57bad5.html ... done #>  #> ℹ Rendering renderthis_39167b57bad5.html into renderthis_3916bb79e82.pdf #> ✔ Rendering renderthis_39167b57bad5.html into renderthis_3916bb79e82.pdf ... do… #>  #> ℹ Removed temporary renderthis_39167b57bad5.html #> ℹ Rendering renderthis_3916bb79e82.pdf into slides.gif #> ✔ Rendering renderthis_3916bb79e82.pdf into slides.gif ... done #>  #> ℹ Removed temporary renderthis_3916bb79e82.pdf

what: Render slides as html file. — to_html
title: Render slides as html file. — to_html
text: Render xaringan quarto slides html file. xaringan slides, thing rmarkdown::render() output_format = "xaringan::moon_reader" except self_contained option forced TRUE HTML file built directory one containing .

title: Render slides as html file. — to_html
code: to_html(from, to = NULL, self_contained = FALSE, rmd_args = NULL)

title: Render slides as html file. — to_html
text: Path Rmd file xaringan slides. name output file. using NULL output file name based file name file. file name provided, path output file can also provided. self_contained output file self-contained HTML file images, CSS JavaScript included directly output file? option, TRUE, provides single HTML file can share others, may large. feature enabled default file written directory one containing R Markdown file. rmd_args list arguments passed rmarkdown::render().

title: Render slides as html file. — to_html
text: Slides rendered html file.

title: Render slides as html file. — to_html
code: with_example("slides.Rmd", {     # Render html from Rmd file     to_html("slides.Rmd") }) #> ℹ Rendering slides.Rmd into slides.html #> ✔ Rendering slides.Rmd into slides.html ... done #>

what: Render slides as a mp4 video file. — to_mp4
title: Render slides as a mp4 video file. — to_mp4
text: Render slides mp4 video file. function renders pdf, converts slide pdf png, converts deck png files mp4 video file.

title: Render slides as a mp4 video file. — to_mp4
code: to_mp4(   from,   to = NULL,   density = 100,   slides = "all",   fps = 1,   complex_slides = FALSE,   partial_slides = FALSE,   delay = 1,   keep_intermediates = FALSE )

title: Render slides as a mp4 video file. — to_mp4
text: Path Rmd file, html file, pdf file, url. url slides website, must provide full url ending ".html". Name output mp4 file. density Resolution resulting pngs slide file. Defaults 100. slides numeric integer vector slide number(s) include mp4, one "", "first", "last". Negative integers select slides include. Defaults "", case slides included. fps Frames per second resulting mp4 file. complex_slides "complex" slides (e.g. slides panelsets html widgets advanced features), set complex_slides = TRUE. Defaults FALSE. use chromote package iterate slides pace set delay argument. Requires local installation Chrome. partial_slides partial (continuation) slides included output? FALSE, default, complete slide included PDF. delay Seconds delay advancing printing new slide. used complex_slides = TRUE partial_slides = TRUE. keep_intermediates keep intermediate files used render final output? default FALSE.

title: Render slides as a mp4 video file. — to_mp4
text: Slides rendered mp4 file.

title: Render slides as a mp4 video file. — to_mp4
code: if (requireNamespace("av", quietly = TRUE)) {     with_example("slides.Rmd", {         # Render mp4 from Rmd, html, pdf, or direct URL         to_mp4("slides.Rmd")     }) } #> ℹ Rendering slides.Rmd into renderthis_391652300953.html #> ✔ Rendering slides.Rmd into renderthis_391652300953.html ... done #>  #> ℹ Rendering renderthis_391652300953.html into renderthis_39167ed4777c.pdf #> ✔ Rendering renderthis_391652300953.html into renderthis_39167ed4777c.pdf ... d… #>  #> ℹ Removed temporary renderthis_391652300953.html #> ℹ Rendering renderthis_39167ed4777c.pdf into slides.mp4 #> ✔ Rendering renderthis_39167ed4777c.pdf into slides.mp4 ... done #>  #> ℹ Removed temporary renderthis_39167ed4777c.pdf

what: Render slides as pdf file. — to_pdf
title: Render slides as pdf file. — to_pdf
text: Render slides pdf file. Requires local installation Chrome. set complex_slides = TRUE partial_slides = TRUE, also need install chromote pdftools packages.

title: Render slides as pdf file. — to_pdf
code: to_pdf(   from,   to = NULL,   complex_slides = FALSE,   partial_slides = FALSE,   delay = 1,   keep_intermediates = NULL )

title: Render slides as pdf file. — to_pdf
text: Path Rmd file, html file, pdf file, url. url slides website, must provide full url ending ".html". name output file. NULL (default) output filename based filename file. filename provided, path output file can also provided. complex_slides "complex" slides (e.g. slides panelsets html widgets advanced features), set complex_slides = TRUE. Defaults FALSE. use chromote package iterate slides pace set delay argument. Requires local installation Chrome. partial_slides partial (continuation) slides included output? FALSE, default, complete slide included PDF. delay Seconds delay advancing printing new slide. used complex_slides = TRUE partial_slides = TRUE. keep_intermediates keep intermediate HTML file? relevant file .Rmd file. Default TRUE file written directory argument, otherwise intermediate file kept.

title: Render slides as pdf file. — to_pdf
text: Slides rendered pdf file.

title: Render slides as pdf file. — to_pdf
code: with_example("slides.Rmd", {     # Render pdf from Rmd, html, or direct URL     to_pdf("slides.Rmd") }) #> ℹ Rendering slides.Rmd into slides.html #> ✔ Rendering slides.Rmd into slides.html ... done #>  #> ℹ Rendering slides.html into slides.pdf #> ✔ Rendering slides.html into slides.pdf ... done #>

what: Render slides as png file(s). — to_png
title: Render slides as png file(s). — to_png
text: Render png image(s) slides. function renders pdf converts png files slide. slide numbers defined slides argument saved (defaults 1, returning title slide). length(slides) > 1, return png files zip file. can also get zip file slides pngs setting slides = "").

title: Render slides as png file(s). — to_png
code: to_png(   from,   to = NULL,   density = 100,   slides = 1,   complex_slides = FALSE,   partial_slides = FALSE,   delay = 1,   keep_intermediates = FALSE )

title: Render slides as png file(s). — to_png
text: Path Rmd file, html file, pdf file, url. url slides website, must provide full url ending ".html". Name output png zip file. density Resolution resulting pngs slide file. Defaults 100. slides numeric integer vector slide number(s) render png files , one "", "first", "last". Negative integers select slides include. one slide included, pngs returned zip file. Defaults "", case slides included. complex_slides "complex" slides (e.g. slides panelsets html widgets advanced features), set complex_slides = TRUE. Defaults FALSE. use chromote package iterate slides pace set delay argument. Requires local installation Chrome. partial_slides partial (continuation) slides included output? FALSE, default, complete slide included PDF. delay Seconds delay advancing printing new slide. used complex_slides = TRUE partial_slides = TRUE. keep_intermediates keep intermediate files used render final output? default FALSE.

title: Render slides as png file(s). — to_png
text: Slides rendered png file (single) zip file multiple png files.

title: Render slides as png file(s). — to_png
code: with_example("slides.Rmd", {     # By default a png of only the first slide is built     to_png("slides.Rmd", keep_intermediates = TRUE)      # or render a zip file of multiple or all slides (`slides = "all"`)     to_png("slides.pdf", slides = c(1, 3, 5)) }) #> ℹ Rendering slides.Rmd into slides.html #> ✔ Rendering slides.Rmd into slides.html ... done #>  #> ℹ Rendering slides.html into slides.pdf #> ✔ Rendering slides.html into slides.pdf ... done #>  #> ℹ Rendering slides.pdf into slides.png #> ✔ Rendering slides.pdf into slides.png ... done #>  #> ℹ Rendering slides.pdf into slides.zip #> ✔ Rendering slides.pdf into slides.zip ... done #>

title: Render slides as pptx file. — to_pptx
text: Path Rmd file, html file, pdf file, url. url slides website, must provide full url ending ".html". Name output pptx file. density Resolution resulting pngs slide file. Defaults 100. slides numeric integer vector slide number(s) include pptx, one "", "first", "last". Negative integers select slides include. Defaults "", case slides included. complex_slides "complex" slides (e.g. slides panelsets html widgets advanced features), set complex_slides = TRUE. Defaults FALSE. use chromote package iterate slides pace set delay argument. Requires local installation Chrome. partial_slides partial (continuation) slides included output? FALSE, default, complete slide included PDF. delay Seconds delay advancing printing new slide. used complex_slides = TRUE partial_slides = TRUE. keep_intermediates keep intermediate files used render final output? default FALSE.

what: Render png image of first slide sized for social media sharing. — to_social
title: Render png image of first slide sized for social media sharing. — to_social
text: Render png image first slide sharing social media. Requires local installation Chrome well webshot2 package: remotes::install_github("rstudio/webshot2").

title: Render png image of first slide sized for social media sharing. — to_social
code: to_social(from, to = NULL)

title: Render png image of first slide sized for social media sharing. — to_social
text: Path Rmd file input media (e.g., xaringan slides). name output file. using NULL output filename based filename file. filename provided, path output file can also provided.

title: Render png image of first slide sized for social media sharing. — to_social
text: Slides rendered png file.

title: Render png image of first slide sized for social media sharing. — to_social
code: if (requireNamespace("webshot2", quietly = TRUE) && interactive()) {     with_example("slides.Rmd", {         # Render png image of first slide from Rmd file         # sized for sharing on social media         to_social("slides.Rmd")     }) }

what: Try renderthis functions with an example — with_example
title: Try renderthis functions with an example — with_example
text: function primarily exists ensure examples package readable. can also use with_example() try various output functions.

title: Try renderthis functions with an example — with_example
code: with_example(example, code, clean = TRUE)

title: Try renderthis functions with an example — with_example
text: example name example file, currently "slides.Rmd". code code expression evaluate. can use example input referencing directly, e.g. = "slides.Rmd". clean example file extra files cleaned function exits? default TRUE, want inspect output set FALSE.

title: Try renderthis functions with an example — with_example
text: Invisibly returns path temp directory example created clean = FALSE, otherwise invisibly returns output evaluating expr.

title: Try renderthis functions with an example — with_example
code: with_example("slides.Rmd", {     to_html("slides.Rmd") }) #> ℹ Rendering slides.Rmd into slides.html #> ✔ Rendering slides.Rmd into slides.html ... done #>   print(with_example("slides.Rmd", getwd())) #> [1] "/tmp/Rtmpuya6Ad/file39161531cf65"
